name: appStartupReporter
author: Gavin Pickin
shortDescription: Report App Startup information to Sentry for ColdBox Apps
description: Report App Startup information to Sentry for ColdBox Apps

scripts.postVersion: package set location='gpickin/appStartupReporter#v`package version`' && echo 'v`package version`' > .version && !git add .version && !git commit -m "Bump the Version"
